findings.title: Contract might completely lock any additional tokens transferred to it
findings.description: The vesting contract only has a claim() function to withdraw tokens, and if additional tokens are sent to the contract, they may get locked as there is no other way to withdraw them.

findings.title: Test Cases can be improved.
findings.description: The test cases do not cover all possible scenarios of the contract and only check for one specific user with an exact token value, missing edge cases that might appear during contract execution.
